text: When was the performance fixed in a sound recording?

-440a9Ct5knDMJd3McJAFJxa-3.buttonText: Fixed in a sound recording before 01 January 1970

-440a9Ct5knDMJd3McJAFJxa-6.buttonText: Public Domain at publication +50 years (old s. 23(1))

-380a9Ct5knDMJd3McJAFJxa-10.buttonText: Public Domain at earlier of: publication +70 years or fixation +100 years (old s.23(1))

-240a9Ct5knDMJd3McJAFJxa-12.buttonText: Fixed in a sound recording on or after 01 January 1970
